name: gingiva_Health-Disease.h5ad
desc: Gingival mucosal biopsies from healthy adults and patients with untreated, severe periodontitis using scRNA-seq (n=21, k=87,240)

name: health_Buccal-Gingival.h5ad
desc: Healthy adult oral mucosa atlas (n=21, k=87,334), containing cells from the gingival mucosa (n=13, k=53,482) and buccal mucosa (n=8, k=34,999)
